channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as sports presenter Mark Chapman, newscaster Gillian Joseph, cricketer Ryan Sidebottom and comedian Fred MacAulay come together to face a Chaser for charity. S12 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: UEFA Euro 2025
channel.desc: Seema Jaswal is joined by Eni Aluko and Vicky Losada for coverage of the UEFA Women's Euro 2025 Group C game between eight-time Euros winners Germany and Sweden in Zurich.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Suspicion
channel.desc: The Devil You Know: Psychological mystery thriller series. Eddie teams up with Aadesh to clear their names, Natalie helps Vanessa and Scott, and Katherine faces pressure. S1 Ep4.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: From the Ground Up
channel.desc: Documentary following former footballer Ian Wright as he launches a girls' team at his former childhood club Ten Em Bee.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Noel Edmonds' Kiwi Adventure
channel.desc: Reality series. Noel and Liz face new challenges in New Zealand as they fight to turn their business around and Noel's love for cars and his legacy project are put to the test. S1 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tour de France Highlights
channel.desc: Stage Eight: Saint-Meen-le-Grand - Laval Espace Mayenne: Gary Imlach presents highlights from the eighth stage of the 2025 Tour de France, a chance for the sprinters to go for glory.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: John and Lisa's Weekend Kitchen
channel.desc: John and Lisa celebrate the humble and low-cost staple that is rice with dishes that include gloriously good Thai mango sticky rice to enjoy at any time of the day. S10 Ep2.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark Tale
channel.desc: Animated comedy film featuring the voices of Will Smith and Robert De Niro, 2004. A small fish with grand aspirations claims that he has killed a shark, but his boast backfires.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
channel.desc: Katie is joined by Steps' Lee Latchford Evans to make a mini allotment, Michael and Gen transform another charity founder, and JJ Goodman serves up more delicious drinks. S1 Ep13.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
channel.desc: Joining Alan at Manor Farm this time are Dame Penelope Keith, Robert Lindsay, Marisha Wallace, ten-week-old guide dog Titch and a new greenhouse for the show.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ninja Warrior UK
channel.desc: More contestants try their luck against the toughest obstacle course on TV alongside Radio 1's Rickie Williams and Melvin Odoom, plus Love Island's Laura Crane. S5 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tomorrow Never Dies
channel.desc: Bond film starring Pierce Brosnan and Michelle Yeoh, 1997. A media tycoon's attempts to orchestrate a war between Britain and China attract the attention of MI6 and 007.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Preston v Liverpool Friendly
channel.desc: Joe Speight and Stephen Warnock provide commentary as Championship side Preston North End face 2024-25 Premier League champions Liverpool in a pre-season friendly at Deepdale.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: In for a Penny
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern is back - travelling the country with his unique brand of games and challenging unsuspecting members of the public, he is in Cardiff this time.

channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as David James, Lucrezia Millarini, Myles Stephenson and Joe Sugg take on the challenge in the hope of winning thousands of pounds for their chosen charities. S12 Ep10.

channel.title: Lingo
channel.desc: Hoping to be as good as their word today are Plymouth couple Antony and Ricky, Greg and his boyfriend Augusto, and mother and daughter Georgia and Sally from North Bedfordshire.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Sarah is keen to fulfil her dreams as Cain and Charity want to help her, and Lewis is a success but Nicola is frustrated.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Daniel attends a job interview at Weatherfield High, Kevin makes a promise to Tyrone, and Mick breaks out of prison and goes in search of his children.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: How Jaws Changed the World
channel.desc: Now 50 years old, Jaws casts a long shadow on both the film industry and the fate of many shark species - this documentary reveals that we now know much more about this species.
